alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Dawson; Gosper; Phelps (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 9:36PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Phelps, western Buffalo, Gosper and southeastern Dawson Counties through 1000 PM CDT... At 936 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles south of Miller to near Overton to near Elwood. Movement was south at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Smithfield around 940 PM CDT. Bertrand around 950 PM CDT. Odessa and Loomis around 955 PM CDT. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 241 and 262. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for south central Nebraska.
